title: Login Issues
body:
It will say you may be offline!

When the commands and delete one it comes back what can i do.
If I try it, it will not work it wont fix it.
I really need your help

replies.body:
The offline error is an issue we're currently investigating, and happens when trying to relog while in a match.  These steps should help solve the issue in the meantime:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

We'll also be posting updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I hope that helps!
